column4: question: i see lots of beryl skydomes on the web but no compiz fusion skydomes
does beryl work with compiz ?
how does the emerald theme manager work with Compiz Fusion is on ?
when*
emerald just gives you annoying window frames
do it through synaptic
does Emerald go along with Compiz Fusion or do you have to use one or the other?
Im using it now, theres only one theme I have that I like,
Yes. compiz is a window manager and emerald is a window decorator ( i think theyre the right terms)
after you install Emerald youll get a control panel in SYSTEM　＞＞＞PREFERENCES
what isnt working?
did you restart after installing it?
double click on the theme and it should apply it, i had to restart to get it to work
it should just apply it
I dont know, will they still work?
I just use high resolution pictures for my skydome
just click the "animate" button
try to find some 360 degree panaramas
do a google search for "panorama"  there are loads of massive ones
np, if you get ones that are a bit taller than the height of your desktop and animate it, it will look cool
